findings.title: Non-compete / non-solicit style restriction
findings.rationale: Restrictive covenants can limit future business activity; enforceability varies and is commonly negotiated.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...5. NON-COMPETE AND NON-SOLICITATION Employee may not work for direct competitors for 1 year after termination within the same geographic region....
findings.context:
jointly owned, with Employer receiving an exclusive license for business use.

4. CONFIDENTIALITY AND NON-DISCLOSURE
Confidentiality obligations continue for 2.5 years after termination of employment.

5. NON-COMPETE AND NON-SOLICITATION
Employee may not work for direct competitors for 1 year after termination within the same geographic region.

6. TERM AND TERMINATION

changes: Added 8 high-signal rules (attorneys fees, liability cap carveouts, assignment restrictions, etc.)
Implemented clause-level anchoring and false-positive suppression
